title: Athletics at the 1995 European Youth Summer Olympic Days
text: The <a href="athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> competition at the <a href="1995%20European%20Youth%20Summer%20Olympic%20Days">1995 European Youth Summer Olympic Days</a> was held from 10 to 13 July. The events took place at the <a href="University%20of%20Bath">University of Bath</a>, United Kingdom. Boys and girls born 1978 or 1979 or later participated 27 <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> events, divided equally between the sexes with the exception of <a href="3000%20metres">3000 metres</a>, <a href="2000%20metres%20steeplechase">2000 metres steeplechase</a> and <a href="pole%20vault">pole vault</a> for boys but not girls.
